item.description:
June Cambridge Meditation Meetup

Monday, June 8th - 7 p.m.

New format for Cambridge Meditation meet up. For each meeting there will be a specific topic. The June topic is "Healthy ways to release stress". Each time we will have a guided meditation that is related to the topic and there will be time to talk about our experiences or insights. The same topic will be also for the Boston Meditation that I facilitate too in Jamaica Plain. If you miss that one, you can always come to Boston on June 11th at 7:30 pm

This meet up will meet for about an hour and a half.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ring the bell on the front porch and I will open the door
item.name: June Cambridge Meditation Meetup
